messages.message: Hi everyone, I’ve created <#C08T0NPHGNB|> to kick off the (probably long and arduous) process of migrating us to Python 3.13. This is most likely going to be an all-hands-on-deck situation, so please join if you’ve got helpful context to provide, or are just interested in following along!
thanks a lot William for starting this initiative. It is very critical to stay current. Much appreciated
